by.bsu.kisel.dao

Interface IDAOStatement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DAOJdbcStatement, DAOJpaStatement

    public interface IDAOStatement
    This interface describes the operations that DAO classes for Statement will implement.
    Author:
    Anastasiya Kisel

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(Statement statement)
      Adds the statement to the database.
      Statement getAllFromStatement(int personId)
      Provides all the information about user's statement.

      Provides all statements.

      Indicates if user's statement exists in the database.
      boolean update(Statement stat, int numberOfAbonements, int discountPercent, int summCost)

    • Method Detail

      • isUserExistInStatement

        boolean isUserExistInStatement(int personId)
                               throws DAOSQLException,
                                      ResourceCreationException
        Indicates if user's statement exists in the database.
        Parameters:
        personId - - id of the person
        Returns:
        boolean flag which indicates if the statement for the user already exists in the database.
        Throws:
        DAOSQLException
        ResourceCreationException

      • add

        boolean add(Statement statement)
            throws DAOSQLException
        Adds the statement to the database.
        Parameters:
        statement - - statement
        Returns:
        boolean flag which indicates if the addition of the user was successful
        Throws:
        DAOSQLException

      • update

        boolean update(Statement stat,
             int numberOfAbonements,
             int discountPercent,
             int summCost)
               throws DAOSQLException,
                      MyLogicalInvalidParameterException,
                      ResourceCreationException
        Updates the statement in the database with the values of the specified method's parameters
        Parameters:
        stat - - statement
        numberOfAbonements - - number of abonements
        discountPercent - - discount percent
        summCost - - total cost
        Returns:
        boolean flag which indicates if the update of the statement was successful
        Throws:
        DAOSQLException
        MyLogicalInvalidParameterException
        ResourceCreationException
